title: Once Upon a Slime
description: "Wildly entertaining... A brilliant resource." - Books and Publishing Crammed full of examples from Andy and Terry's bestselling books, Once upon a Slime is designed to inspire you to have as much fun playing with ideas, words and drawings as Andy and Terry do when they get together to create their crazy cartoons, ridiculous rhymes, silly stories, comic novels and stupid guide books.Is this the right book for you?Take the SLIME TEST and find out.- Have you ever wondered where ideas come from and how stories are made?- Would you like to know the true stories behind some of Andy and Terry's books and characters?- Would you like to discover 45 great ways to have fun with words and pictures? If you answered YES to any of these questions, then this is definitely the right book for you! If you answered NO to all of these questions then you are an IDIOT and this is DEFINITELY the right book for you!
author: Andy Griffiths
